title: Spacious 1 bed 1.5 bath Apartment
posting_body: Be the first to live in this newly renovated one bedroom one and a half baths across the street from the Airport- Bremen park!
Open kitchen and living room layout with private deck and just over 700SF of living space!
The kitchen features black wood-colored modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and beautifully stained natural hardwood floors throughout.
Bedroom includes spacious walk in closet for extra storage and outlets on every wall.
This home offers washer and dryer in unit as well as central AC and forced hot air.
New plumbing, electrical, insulation and gorgeous windows results in a highly efficient building and thus lower utility costs for tenants.
